title: Night and Day - the description of Katharine

content.question: The description of Katharine in the first paragraph primarily emphasizes her

choices.label: mature view of complicated family relationships
passive participation in events she cannot fully understand
feelings of confusion about her parents’ changeable attitudes
unquestioning belief that her family’s past will ensure her future success

content.answer: passive participation in events she cannot fully understand

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
